query:
SELECT MD.sched_dt, 
       MD.product, 
       MD.planned_qty, 
       MD.started_qty, 
       RS.item_id 
FROM   ilm.mps_data MD, 
       rs_discount@sfdm RS 
WHERE  ( To_char(MD.sched_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') >= To_char(sysdate - .5, 'YYYYMMDD') 
         AND To_char(MD.sched_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') <= 
             To_char(sysdate + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') ) 
       AND RS.mfg_center IN ( 'MSA', 'PKG' ) 
       AND MD.product = RS.routername 
       AND RS.step = 10 
       AND RS.routerrevision = (SELECT Max(R.routerrevision) 
                                FROM   rs_discount@sfdm R 
                                WHERE  R.routername = MD.product) 
       AND MD.started_qty < MD.planned_qty 
ORDER  BY 1, 
          2
